script:
1). Did you attend the training seminar?
Yes, I couldn't.
Yes. It was great! 
No, I'm afraid I can't.
2). You didn't order more printing ink, did you?
No I didn't. Sorry. 
Yes, I will.
No I haven't.
3). Ms. Barnes is out sick today.
I'll be sick tomorrow.
I'm fine. And you?
Sorry to hear that.
